hero.description: At SolutionsBI, we offer technology solutions to help your company grow, innovate, and stand out in the market. Discover our services and find out how we can help boost your business.

benefits.description: At SolutionsBI, we offer technology solutions to help your company grow, innovate, and stand out in the market. Discover our services and find out how we can help boost your business.

cards.title: Mission
cards.description: Our mission is to offer technology solutions to help your company grow, innovate, and stand out in the market.

cards.title: Vision
cards.description: Our vision is to be the best technology company in Brazil and be recognized internationally.

cards.title: Values
cards.description: Our values are honesty, transparency, ethics, and quality.

questions.question: How can I hire SolutionsBI services?
questions.answer: To hire our services, contact us through our phone number or email.

questions.question: What are SolutionsBI's service hours?
questions.answer: Our service hours are Monday to Friday, from 8 am to 6 pm.

questions.question: Does SolutionsBI offer technical support?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer technical support to our clients.

questions.question: Does SolutionsBI offer any discounts for students?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer discounts for students.

hero.description: Learn more about our history and how it all started.

timeline.title:
from an innovative
vision to
global impact
timeline.description: Founded in 2019, Solutions BI was born with the mission of transforming data into valuable insights for companies across various sectors. From the beginning, our focus has been on empowering our clients with cutting-edge technological solutions, enabling them to make more informed and strategic decisions. Over the years, we have grown and expanded our operations globally, delivering more than 150 projects in 9 different countries, always maintaining a commitment to excellence and innovation.

events.title: From the Beginning to Scalability
events.description: It all started in 2019 with the printing of some business cards and the first project with a client from RJ. This same client would return to us in 2023. Our first partner joined the team, bringing other projects to continue our growth.

events.title: From Diversification to a New Company
events.description: We diversified our services, operating in sectors such as IT, Medicine, Industries, and Logistics. SolutionsBI is legally established as a company, consolidates its clients, and hires its first employee.

events.title: Globalization
events.description: We are now present in projects on 4 different continents, increasing our team and partnerships.

events.title: Growth
events.description: SolutionsBI is now present in major National and International projects. We have a consolidated and engaged team. At this point, we are already working on projects in Brazil, England, Germany, Portugal, USA, Uruguay, and Barbados.

events.title: Maturation
events.description: In this phase, we created internal processes for financial management, hiring, people, professional growth, and marketing. We actively participate in city projects and close an exclusive international partnership.

events.title: Traction
events.description: Seeking exponential growth, we diversify our services, create our products, and invest in resources to further increase the quality of our service to our clients.
